Produces an HTML report in the current working directory to evaluate regressivity in the supplied jurisdiction

Source: R/make_report.R
make_report.Rd

Produces an HTML report in the current working directory to evaluate regressivity in the supplied jurisdiction

make_report(ratios, jurisdiction_name, output_dir = "", diagnostic = FALSE)

Arguments

ratios

a dataframe which has been preprocessed by reformat_data
jurisdiction_name

the name of the jurisdiction being analyzed
output_dir

optional, specify a folder to save the output in
diagnostic

optional, if TRUE includes additional sections evaluating data quality

Value

produces a file named `jurisdiction_name.html` in the working directory

Contents

Developed by Eric Langowski.
